alert.note: Alert for Beartooth Foothills; Crazy Mountains; Livingston Area; Melville Foothills; Northern Park; Northern Sweet Grass; Paradise Valley (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 07 at 7:56PM MDT by NWS Billings
info.description: ...Strong wind gusts from showers and thunderstorms will impact portions of southwestern Stillwater, southwestern Carbon, Sweet Grass and central Park Counties through 900 PM MDT... At 752 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking showers and thunderstorms producing strong wind gusts along a line extending from 9 miles north of Clyde Park to 15 miles north of Cooke City. Movement was northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 55 mph. 52 mph wind gust was reported in Livingston with this activity. Blowing dust. SOURCE...Radar and spotter report indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Sudden strong gusts may arrive well ahead of any precipitation or thunder. Blowing dust may reduce visibility below a mile at times. Locations impacted include... Livingston, Big Timber, Clyde Park, Chico Hot Springs, Springdale, Mystic Lake, Fishtail, Alpine, Dean, Mc Leod, Pine Creek, Chico, Greycliff, Wilsall, Nye, Roscoe, Luther and Emigrant. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Drivers should be prepared for sudden strong crosswinds and poor visibility due to blowing dust.
